short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your artworks generated on Midjourney with KALOS.art, just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use it?

1. Ensure that you are logged into your [Midjourney.com](http://midjourney.com/) and KALOS.art accounts. 
2. On the Home page of [Midjourney.com](http://midjourney.com/), click to enlarge any piece of work you've generated. The icon of this plugin will turn colorful, click on it, and the browser will open the artworks publish page of KALOS.art in a new tab. The artwork image and prompt have been automatically loaded by this extension as publishable content. 
3. All you need to do is click the Publish Button to post your artworks on KALOS, then, enjoy the cheers.

updates:
v1.1.0 add support for fetching post from zhihu and wechat
